scripts.demo-client-build: cd ./client && npm run build && shx mv build/* ../demo/musica
scripts.demo-media-init: cross-env MUSICA_STORAGE_TYPE=fs MUSICA_STORAGE_PATH=demo/musica/media MUSICA_STORAGE_MEDIALOCATION=/musica/media node musica init
scripts.demo-media-insert: cross-env MUSICA_STORAGE_TYPE=fs MUSICA_STORAGE_PATH=demo/musica/media MUSICA_STORAGE_MEDIALOCATION=/musica/media node musica insert music/*
scripts.demo-media-export: cross-env MUSICA_STORAGE_TYPE=fs MUSICA_STORAGE_PATH=demo/musica/media MUSICA_STORAGE_MEDIALOCATION=/musica/media node musica export > demo/musica/musica
scripts.demo-build: run-s demo-clean demo-client-build demo-media-init demo-media-insert demo-media-export
